plot: Determined to uncover Hiram's plans, Jughead presses Veronica about what she may know; Cheryl makes a surprising connection with an unlikely friend.

Hiram arranges for a weekend getaway for Veronica and her friends, as some mob families come to Riverdale for a secret meeting. The four friends start off having a good time, but tensions quickly bubble to the surface between Archie, Jughead, Betty, and Veronica when a Barchie kiss is exposed, Hiram's capo is found to be lurking in the forest, and phone calls from their respective parents rattle Betty and Jughead. Determined to learn Hiram's plans for Riverdale, Jughead presses Veronica about what she may know. Tensions come to a head when a home invasion threatens all of their safety and pushes Archie to a place he may never come back from. Meanwhile, back in Riverdale, a movie night is the backdrop for fostering new and old bonds as Moose, Midge, and Kevin hang out amidst some awkwardness, Cheryl opens up to Toni about a past trauma, and Josie lands in hot water after revealing a secret to Kevin.—snowflakeaudrey
